Articles.Content:
After finally getting my home computer set up to a reasonable state I realized how nice it was to have it just right, to have it just the way I like it. So what are your setups that you are currently working on or have completed and are currently enjoying having in that just right state.

Here's mine by the way, both monitors are second hand as well as the Logitech Z506 sound system. I also have a printer tucked behind the right hand monitor. My only major complaint about it is that my headset stand is just a massive bulldog clip.

Mine is pretty simple http://www.google.ca/imgres?imgurl=http://gamingdead.com/wp-content/uploads/2009/07/xbox-360-versions-430x289.jpg&imgrefurl=http://gamingdead.com/2009/09/23/catching-up-with-the-times-to-buy-or-not-to-buy-an-xbox-360&h=289&w=430&tbnid=FFzhBTXpdBW1pM:&docid=Jd7qhZnRtfnicM&hl=en-ca&ei=5akfVqzjO4G0eui0nrAB&tbm=isch&client=safari&ved=0CB8QMygCMAJqFQoTCOzpxbHKxMgCFQGaHgodaJoHFg

And i I also have a computer from the early 2000nds that can no longer play ksp
@Dodgey I have those same speakers

Ethanadams nothing wrong with having a console, it's a lot easier than troubleshooting errors with a pc, and that's a shame to hear about your pc .

Slam that's cool! I got mine for a steal! Only $50 Australian dollars with RRP being around $150 .
